title: I Was a Good Person, and Then a Lot of Things Betrayed Me - Novel Updates
tags: Betrayal   Childhood Friends   Dense Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Past Plays a Big Role   R-15
author: 南川せいしょう
description: Yusei Shinzaki, a high school freshman, was a good person. Yes, he was just a good person. Of course, there are some people who consider him as a fool. But still he kept on being a good person. Until he reached his limit….>
